bill_title: revise certain provisions concerning the use of certain real property sales to value other real property.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions concerning the use of certain real property sales to value other real property. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 10-6-74 be amended to read as follows: 10-6-74. Any real property which sells for more than one hundred fifty sixty percent of its assessed value, may not be used for the purpose of valuing other real property. The sale of any real property which is not used for the purpose of valuing other real property pursuant to this section may not be used in any sales ratio study. Section 2. That § 10-6-74 be amended to read as follows: 10-6-74. Any real property which sells for more than one hundred fifty one hundred seventy percent of its assessed value, may not be used for the purpose of valuing other real property. The sale of any real property which is not used for the purpose of valuing other real property pursuant to this section may not be used in any sales ratio study. Section 3. That § 10-6-74 be amended to read as follows: 10-6-74. Any real property which sells for more than one hundred fifty one hundred eighty percent of its assessed value, may not be used for the purpose of valuing other real property. The sale of any real property which is not used for the purpose of valuing other real property pursuant to this section may not be used in any sales ratio study. Section 4. That § 10-6-74 be amended to read as follows: 10-6-74. Any real property which sells for more than one hundred fifty one hundred ninety percent of its assessed value, may not be used for the purpose of valuing other real property. The sale of any real property which is not used for the purpose of valuing other real property pursuant to this section may not be used in any sales ratio study. Section 5. That § 10-6-74 be amended to read as follows: 10-6-74. Any real property which sells for more than one hundred fifty two hundred percent of its assessed value, may not be used for the purpose of valuing other real property. The sale of any real property which is not used for the purpose of valuing other real property pursuant to this section may not be used in any sales ratio study. Section 6. That § 10-6-74 be amended to read as follows: 10-6-74. Any real property which sells for more than one hundred fifty two hundred ten percent of its assessed value, may not be used for the purpose of valuing other real property. The sale of any real property which is not used for the purpose of valuing other real property pursuant to this section may not be used in any sales ratio study. Section 7. Section 2 is effective on July 1, 2008. Section 8. Section 3 is effective on July 1, 2009. Section 9. Section 4 is effective on July 1, 2010. Section 10. Section 5 is effective on July 1, 2011. Section 11. Section 6 is effective on July 1, 2012. Section 12. That § 10-6-74 be repealed on July 1, 2013.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
